attributes.action: Keep BBC 6 Music on the air for us all to enjoy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Brown, 

We the undersigned are heartbroken that the BBC is thinking about closing 6 music.  

It's pretty much everything we ever wanted in a radio station.  And really, there is nothing else quite like it.  It is the unique that the BBC strives for.  

If it is 'disappeared' there will be a 6 shaped whole in our lives.     

Please do all you can in your prime ministerial power to save it.   

Crossing our fingers and toes.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
